name: Wild wild past
instructions: Remember history lessons? You're about to enter a time machine on a journey into the past in this category of History.

name: Into the (un)known
instructions: Put on an investigator's gown and grab the magnifying glass because you're about to enter the world of the unknown in this category of Science & Nature.

name: Hollywood & friends
instructions: What's your favorite movie? Welcome to the Hollywood world. Films, directors, actors, years and years of cinema are present in this category of Films.

name: Do Re Mi
instructions: You know that song by The Beatles that you can't get enough of singing? Symphonic orchestras, records and rock & roll. Do you know everything about Music?

name: Knowledge sponge
instructions: Let's test your intelligence. How much information have you accumulated over time? Give everything in this category of General Knowledge.

name: Color Ribbons
instructions: This is the world of brushes, colors, brush strokes, paints, drawings, paintings and artists. What do you know about the art world?

name: Comics
instructions: Superheroes? Fantasy? Are you up to this comics trivia?

name: Fitness Blender
instructions: We have a sports blender selected just for you. Do you carefully follow everything about exercising? What do you know about the Sport category?
